name: Pages of Wrath
description:
Young town writer Eliseus, in his pursuit after inspirational experience, visits a remote forest village. In its daily life, the villagers respect their most ancient traditions and live without worry or troubles. Except deeper, beneath the surface, there is a terrible secret. And that secret is spilling over, inviting conflict and tragedy - all coinciding with the writer's timely arrival!

The game, for the purposes of better polish and certain development issues, was divided into two parts. The second part would be worked upon after the jam release, to be complete, with multiple endings and overall a step-up in every aspect that seem lacking at the point of upload.
